title: Ultra White Collar Boxing London 17.12.15
desc: Ticket Options Standing Tickets are available at ?20 or VIP Tables ?400.? Our VIP Table option seats up to 10 people including Waitress service and Ringside seats adn extra entertainment. ? Dress Code We operate a VERY strict dress code policy - Minimum Shirt, Tie, Trousers and Smart Shoes for the Men  Evening dresses for ladies, or suitable smart trousers and Blouse.? No Jeans, Trainers, Checked Shirts or Scruffs. Please Dress to impress.? ? ? Are there ID requirements or an age limit to enter the event? Yes you must be 18 or over to enter one of our events ID May be requested on the door. ? Is my registration/ticket transferrable? No, Tickets are not transferable ? Do I have to bring my printed ticket to the event? There will be a list at the door, which will include the names of people who have purchased online, please bring your mobile so that we can check your online ticket. ? What is the refund policy? We do not offer any refunds and tickets are non transferable.
